üé® Color Palette

Primary Color: Deep red (#C21807) ‚Äî symbolizes strength, precision, and reliability.

Secondary Color: Black and charcoal gray ‚Äî adds contrast and a sense of professionalism.

Accent Colors: White and light gray ‚Äî used for text contrast and background clarity.

Use red for buttons and key highlights (like ‚ÄúApply‚Äù or ‚ÄúLogin‚Äù), black for headers and navigation bars, and white backgrounds to keep the layout readable and modern.

## Plan
- Created new branch `feature/update-color-palette`
- Updated color constants with new palette
- Updated navigation bar to use black background
- Updated all buttons and highlights to use red (#C21807)
- Updated headers to use black styling
- Updated all components with new color scheme

## Code Changes

### Color Constants (`constants/Colors.ts`)
- Added `PRIMARY_RED` (#C21807)
- Added `BLACK`, `CHARCOAL_GRAY`, `WHITE`, `LIGHT_GRAY`, `BORDER_GRAY`, `TEXT_GRAY`
- Updated theme colors to use new palette

### Updated Files
- **GlobalNavbar**: Black background with red active states
- **All App Screens** (index, dashboard, profile, report-issue, property-details, daily-work-plan, time-tracking): Updated buttons, headers, and text colors
- **Components**: ClockInOutButton, EmployeeDashboard, ViolationForm, CameraButton - all use red for primary actions

## Steps Taken
1. Created branch `feature/update-color-palette`
2. Updated `Colors.ts` with new color palette constants
3. Updated navigation bar with black background and red active indicators
4. Updated all headers to use black backgrounds with white text
5. Updated all buttons (Login, Submit, Continue, etc.) to use red (#C21807)
6. Updated all icons and highlights to use red instead of green
7. Updated text colors to use charcoal gray and text gray for better contrast
8. Updated StatusBar styles for black headers (light-content)

## Notes
- All hardcoded colors replaced with palette constants
- Buttons and key highlights now use deep red (#C21807)
- Headers and navigation use black with white text
- Backgrounds remain white for readability
- No linter errors introduced
- Status badges for "resolved" status now use red instead of green

The color palette update is complete and ready for review.
